api_list.name: Names
api_list.description: Get the saint related to the specified name

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Separated by commas, the names you want to search for. No default: this field is mandatory

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://santopedia.p.rapidapi.com/names/Maria"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "santopedia.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://santopedia.p.rapidapi.com/names/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "santopedia.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Saints of the day
api_list.description: It returns the saints of a given day

optional_parameters.name: day
optional_parameters.description: Optional (if not included, TODAY is default). The date you want to know the saints from (format MM-DD). If you only want to recieve 1-3 relevant saints, add ",important" after the MM-DD date, like 07-31,important

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://santopedia.p.rapidapi.com/days/07-31"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "santopedia.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://santopedia.p.rapidapi.com/days/{day}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "santopedia.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
